formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: A DOMAIN ERROR occurs with the following message:

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: Stack trace indicates that this is called from the mcall on the expression F1 52 52 which is a function to be called in the initialization function. This requires the declaration of a temporary array. The code expects that the GenArrDec returns an LLVM Value reference, but it instead returns the string name of the temporary array. The fix is to instead return the LLVM Value reference to the caller instead of the string variable name.
